summary_short: Introduces Agrafena Alexandrovna Grushenka, Samsonov, Agrafena Alexandrovna Karamazov, Grushenkas Cook And Granddaughter, and 2 others. Alyosha Karamazov is the most connected figure (62 ties). Key relationship types: friend, romantic interest.

Key ties: Agrafena–Samsonov (protector), Grushenka–Agrafena (landlady), Agrafena–Grushenka (lodger), Agrafena–Samsonov (protegee), +10 more

story_summary: Grushenka reveals to Alyosha and Rakitin her troubled past, her conflicted feelings about a man who wronged her, and her anticipation of a message from him. She expresses a mix of resentment, forgiveness, and emotional turmoil, ultimately deciding to meet the man despite her fears. After receiving a letter confirming his summons, she prepares to leave, asking Alyosha to convey a message to Dmitri before shutting herself away, while Rakitin departs angrily and Alyosha walks alone to the monastery.
evidence_quotes: I am expecting a message. If the message comes, I shall fly.
He has sent for me... I will go... five years of my life!
